name: YourParkingSpace.co.uk
slogan: Think of Airbnb, but for parking!
description:
YourParkingSpace is one of the UK’s hottest transport tech companies. We’re rapidly growing with the mission of changing the way the world parks. Drivers across the UK use the YourParkingSpace mobile app or website to book convenient and affordable parking on demand or in advance. Private space owners and commercial operators rely on us to fill their empty parking spaces, connecting them to an online audience of drivers searching for parking. Our platform uses industry-leading technology to deliver value to both sides of this exciting and rapidly evolving marketplace.

Learn more about us at yourparkingspace.co.uk

team.title: Head of SEO
team.name: Gregory Golinski
team.bioHtml: I'm the Head of SEO at YourParkingSpace

team.title: CPO
team.name: Brannan Coady
team.bioHtml: CEo of Netsells Group. Founder/Director of Railguard, YourParkingSpace, Bagboard

jobs.title: Business Analyst
jobs.description:
We are looking for someone with demonstrated client-facing experience in a UX, Project Management or Business Analyst role to join our team. As a Business Analyst, you will be working across multiple business divisions to understand product requirements, planning these thoroughly alongside the product manager and User Experience designers. 

Joining the YourParkingSpace team is a real career game changer, it’s a unique experience to work for a fast-growing tech company in a role with unlimited potential for growth. Alongside a generous annual leave allowance and competitive salary, we also give you “Beer Fridays”, pool table and games machines within the office  and other fun perks.

**THE ROLE**
* Understanding all business needs in full, conducting competitor analysis, user research and producing product requirement documents
* Producing user stories and process maps, detailing the required functionality of a feature or new product, and how it should be structured
* Creating accurate wireframes, and branding documentation alongside designers
* Gathering estimates and ensuring that the proposed product falls within the businesses defined budget
* Presenting detailed specifications (produced by you) to all stakeholders
* Working with the QA team who will produce User Acceptance Test Plans for the product you have specced
* Developing future functionality roadmaps with Account Managers

**THE RIGHT PERSON**
* Good general knowledge of wide selection apps and websites on the market
* Able to communicate confidently with peers, customers and management
* Inquisitive, innovative and resourceful: constantly looking for ways to improve processes
* Pursues analytical insights that provide thoughtful answers to complex problems
* Experience working with wireframing tools such as Balsamiq, Sketch and others
* A self starter, able to work from own initiative, ensuring deadlines are met with quality kept high
* Familiar with a variety of business models, current changes within the digital industry, as well as overall news and events

jobs.title: Customer Happiness Executive
jobs.description:
We are looking for someone who is passionate about delivering excellent customer service and enthusiastic about getting things done, to join our small but awesome team, whose long term aim is to deliver the best customer service within the parking industry.

Whether a customer has contacted us with a general query or a complaint, you will need to be fast-acting, stay calm under pressure and remain positive throughout to ensure an exceptional customer experience is provided. It’s necessary to expect the unexpected as unanticipated issues occur. You will need to be a keen problem-solver in order to handle any difficult situations which may arise.

Being a growing start up means you’re in control of your career, there’s huge potential to accelerate your career simply by putting in the effort, showing flexibility and a willingness to get your hands dirty. You’ll dive straight in the deep end and will make a genuine impact on the growth of the company; making suggestions to improve inefficiencies is part of the role.

**THE ROLE**
* Acting as the first point of contact for customers
* Engaging and communicating with users and potential users to give advice and answer any queries
* Handling incoming and outgoing customer interactions, using keen investigative skills to resolve any and all issues
* Providing prompt responses, within set service level agreements using our customer support software, Zendesk
* Driving sales and contributing towards achieving monthly sales targets as part of a team

**THE RIGHT PERSON**
* Experience in a customer-facing role
* Exceptional computer skills
* Keen attention to detail
* Able to communicate to an excellent standard
* Not afraid to ask questions
* Loves getting things done
* Wants to experience a fast-paced, growing start up environment

jobs.title: Head of Key Accounts
jobs.description:
We are looking for an experienced senior relationship manager focusing on growing and retaining revenue through actively managing client relationships, cross-selling and introducing new solutions. You will play a crucial role in building out and maintaining the client relationship process, ensuring that long-term and significant relationships are nurtured with high value clients.

Joining the YourParkingSpace team is a real career game changer, it’s a unique experience to work for a fast-growing tech company in a role with unlimited potential for growth. Alongside a generous annual leave allowance and competitive salary, we also give you a work-free day of birth, a free gym membership and other fun perks.

**THE ROLE**
* Cultivate and lead a high standard team; Setting objectives, developing and training to improve skill set
* Allocation and review of work prepared before submission to clients, ensuring deadlines are met and quality standards maintained
* Strategic planning of resource and responsibilities among the team
* Create and maintain an engagement plan for each client
* Maintain up to date insight into the strategy, priority and issues 
* Communicate management information pertaining to key client accounts to Commercial Sales team

**THE RIGHT PERSON**
* Proven track record of leading an established team, improving personnel, developing systems and building strong client relationships
* Experience working in a tech firm with a high growth company is advantageous but not essential
* Client engagement skills with ability to understand and anticipate needs, and then successfully articulate the benefits of YourParkingSpace solutions
* Commercial understanding, able to identify opportunities and propose solutions

jobs.title: Quality Control Executive
jobs.description:
We are looking for someone who is passionate about delivering excellent customer service and meticulous in their work to join our rapidly expanding team. As a Quality Control Executive you will be working directly with our Space Owner community to create the largest parking marketplace in the UK. You will be an expert to our Space Owners, reviewing new listings and optimising their registered spaces in order to best optimise their earning potential.

Joining the YourParkingSpace team is a real career game changer, it’s a unique experience to work for a fast-growing tech company in a role with unlimited potential for growth. Alongside a generous annual leave allowance and competitive salary, we also give you a work-free day of birth, a free gym membership and other fun perks.

**THE ROLE**
Working as a member of the quality control team to build a thriving space owner community
Reviewing new listings before approving on the YourParkingSpace platform to maintain a strong level of quality
Analysing location reviews to understand how drivers interact with our hosts and inventory and identify areas where listings and communications can be improved
Assisting with onboarding abandoned listings and work closely with management to identify opportunities to develop the listing process
Completing the necessary follow up work to bring both new and existing listings up to quality standards in a timely manner
Problem-solving issues which put your resolution, analytical, and investigative skills to the test

**THE RIGHT PERSON**
Experience in a customer-facing role alongside exceptional computer skills
Detail-oriented. Understand the importance of accuracy and believe diligence is key
Inquisitive, innovative and resourceful: constantly looking for ways to improve processes
Pursues analytical insights that provide thoughtful answers to complex problems
Passionate about YourParkingSpace and eager to contribute to a fast-growing tech company

jobs.title: Sales and Retentions Executive
jobs.description:
As a Sales and Retentions Executive, you will be responsible for all customers who are looking to cancel their bookings. Whether you can resolve an issue to keep a driver within the same parking space, or finding the driver a new more suitable car park the key is keeping the customer happy, with YourParkingSpace. You will need to be tenacious with a passion for selling and working towards targets
Joining the YourParkingSpace team is a real career game changer, it’s a unique experience to work for a fast-growing tech company in a role with unlimited potential for growth. Alongside a generous annual leave allowance and competitive salary, we also give you a work-free day of birth, a free gym membership and other fun perks.

**THE ROLE**
* Acting as the first point of contact for all customers who are requesting to cancel their parking space
* Communicating with users and potential users to five advise and answer any queries
* Securing sales in the form of retaining customers, contributing towards achieving monthly sales targets both individually and as part of a team
* Documenting the reasons for customers requesting to cancel to deliver insight into what issues are causing the cancellation requests

**THE RIGHT PERSON**
* Experience in a customer-facing role alongside exceptional computer skills
* Excellent telephone manner with a proven track-record of selling over the phone
* Detail-oriented. Understand the importance of accuracy and believe diligence is key
* Focused with the ability to self-motivate
* Passionate about YourParkingSpace and eager to contribute to a fast-growing tech company
